```{r setup, include=FALSE}
.libPaths(Sys.getenv("R_LIBS_USER"))

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

# detach all libraries

detachAllPackages <- function() {
  basic.packages <- c("package:stats", "package:graphics", "package:grDevices", "package:utils", "package:datasets", "package:methods", "package:base")
  package.list <- search()[ifelse(unlist(gregexpr("package:", search()))==1, TRUE, FALSE)]
  package.list <- setdiff(package.list, basic.packages)
  if (length(package.list)>0)  for (package in package.list) detach(package,  character.only=TRUE)
}
detachAllPackages()

# function to load libraries

pkgTest <- function(pkg){
  new.pkg <- pkg[!(pkg %in% installed.packages()[,  "Package"])]
  if (length(new.pkg)) 
    install.packages(new.pkg,  dependencies = TRUE)
  sapply(pkg,  require,  character.only = TRUE)
}

# knitr

knitr::knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options){
  if(!is.null(options$max_height)){
    paste('<pre style = "max-height:', options$max_height, '; float: left; width: 910px; overflow-y: auto;">', x, "</pre>", sep = "")
  }else{
    x
  }
  
})

# loading packages 
lapply(c("tidyverse"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("readr"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("paletteer"),pkgTest)
lapply(c("kableExtra"),pkgTest)
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(paletteer)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
options(width = 60)
local({
  hook_output <- knitr::knit_hooks$get('output')
  knitr::knit_hooks$set(output = function(x, options) {
    if (!is.null(options$max.height)) options$attr.output <- c(
      options$attr.output,
      sprintf('style="max-height: %s;"', options$max.height)
    )
    hook_output(x, options)
  })
})
```

### Importing Data  

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
# setwd("/Users/kdlee/Desktop/MIAU-exer-FA/data")

# setwd("/Users/carolinelee/Desktop/MIAU-exer-FA/data")

# setwd("/Users/48909138/OneDrive - Southern Methodist University/Desktop/MIAU-exer-FA/data")

setwd("/Users/kdlee/Desktop/MIAU-exer-FA/data") 

Community_Overall <- read_csv("Com_Overall_FA.csv")

Community_Positive <- read_csv("Com_Pos_FA.csv")

Community_Negative <- read_csv("Com_Neg_FA.csv")

MTurk_Overall <- read_csv("MTurk_Overall_FA.csv")

MTurk_Positive <- read_csv("MTurk_Pos_FA.csv")

MTurk_Negative <- read_csv("MTurk_Neg_FA.csv")

SMU_Overall <- read_csv("SMU_Overall_FA.csv")

SMU_Positive <- read_csv("SMU_Pos_FA.csv")

SMU_Negative <- read_csv("SMU_Neg_FA.csv")
```

### Compiling Data 

```{r, results='asis'}
Merge1 <- merge(Community_Overall, Community_Positive, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge2 <- merge(Merge1, Community_Negative, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge3 <- merge(Merge2, MTurk_Overall, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge4 <- merge(Merge3, MTurk_Positive, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge5 <- merge(Merge4, MTurk_Negative, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge6 <- merge(Merge5, SMU_Overall, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Merge7 <- merge(Merge6, SMU_Positive, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)

Final_DF <- merge(Merge7, SMU_Negative, by = "Item_No", all.x = TRUE)
```

```{r}
Final_DF_NoNum <- Final_DF[,-1]

Final_DF$LoadedFactor <- apply(Final_DF_NoNum, 1, function(i) paste(colnames(Final_DF_NoNum)[!is.na(i) ], collapse = ", "))

function1 <- function(x) {
  count.fields(textConnection(Final_DF$LoadedFactor[x]), sep = ",", blank.lines.skip = FALSE)
}

tbl1 <- as.data.frame(table(function1(1:312)))

knitr::kable(tbl1)
```

```{r}
FL_count <- as.list(function1(1:312)) # number of factor loadings per item 

### ZERO FACTOR LOADINGS ###

# red list, items that did not load on any factor =========================== RED 1 START

zeroFL_items <- which(FL_count == 0)

# =========================================================================== RED 1 END

### ONE FACTOR LOADING ###

# red list, items that only loaded on one factor =========================== RED 2 START

oneFL_items <- which(FL_count == 1)

# =========================================================================== RED 2 END

### TWO FACTOR LOADINGS 

twoFL_items <- which(FL_count == 2) # subsetting for items that loaded on two factors

twoFL_df <- Final_DF[twoFL_items, ]

tbl2 <- as.data.frame(table(twoFL_df$LoadedFactor))

knitr::kable(tbl2)
```

```{r}
twoFL_notsplit_df <- with(twoFL_df, which(LoadedFactor %in% c("Com_Neg_F2_NegApp, SMU_Overall_F4_NegApp", "Com_Neg_F5_NegApp_Prelim, SMU_Overall_F4_NegApp", "Com_Pos_F1_Cog, SMU_Pos_F1_Cog", "Com_Pos_F4_Flow, SMU_Overall_F8_Flow", "MTurk_Neg_F2_NegHealth, SMU_Neg_F5_NegHealth_Prelim", "MTurk_Overall_F7_Flow, SMU_Overall_F8_Flow")))

twoFL_notsplit_df <- twoFL_df[twoFL_notsplit_df, ]

twoFL_notsplit_NoNum <- twoFL_notsplit_df[,-c(1, 49)] # removing non-numerical columns

twoFL_notsplit_df$firstloading <- apply(twoFL_notsplit_NoNum, 1, function(z) na.omit(z)[1]) # extract first loading 

twoFL_notsplit_df$firstloading <- as.numeric(twoFL_notsplit_df$firstloading)

twoFL_notsplit_df$secondloading <- apply(twoFL_notsplit_NoNum, 1, function(z) na.omit(z)[2]) # extract second loading 

twoFL_notsplit_df$secondloading <- as.numeric(twoFL_notsplit_df$secondloading)

twoFL_notsplit_df$firstFL_inrange <- ifelse(abs(twoFL_notsplit_df$firstloading) >= .40 & abs(twoFL_notsplit_df$firstloading) < .75, TRUE, FALSE)

twoFL_notsplit_df$secondFL_inrange <- ifelse(abs(twoFL_notsplit_df$secondloading) >= .40 & abs(twoFL_notsplit_df$secondloading) < .75, TRUE, FALSE)

twoFL_notsplit_df$category <- ifelse(twoFL_notsplit_df$firstFL_inrange == TRUE & twoFL_notsplit_df$secondFL_inrange == TRUE, "YELLOW", "RED")

# items that loaded in range in two different samples for the same factor ======== YELLOW 1 START

twoFL_YELLOW <- with(twoFL_notsplit_df, which(category %in% "YELLOW"))

twoFL_YELLOW <- twoFL_notsplit_df[twoFL_YELLOW, ]

twoFL_YELLOW_items <- twoFL_YELLOW$Item_No 

# ========================================================================= YELLOW 1 END 

# non-split items that were in range in only one or out of range in both == RED 3 START

twoFL_RED_notsplit <- with(twoFL_notsplit_df, which(category %in% "RED"))

twoFL_RED_notsplit <- twoFL_notsplit_df[twoFL_RED_notsplit, ]

twoFL_RED_notsplit_items <- twoFL_RED_notsplit$Item_No 

# ========================================================================= RED 3 END 

# split items ============================================================= RED 4 START
twoFL_split_df <- with(twoFL_df, which(LoadedFactor %in% c("Com_Neg_F1_Time, MTurk_Neg_F5_Pain", "Com_Overall_F7_Soc, MTurk_Overall_F4_PosApp", "Com_Pos_F1_Cog, Com_Pos_F2_Pride", "Com_Pos_F7_Flow_Prelim, SMU_Overall_F5_Prog", "MTurk_Overall_F4_PosApp, SMU_Neg_F1_Time")))

twoFL_split_df <- twoFL_df[twoFL_split_df, ]

twoFL_RED_split_items <- twoFL_split_df$Item_No

# ========================================================================= RED 4 END

### THREE FACTOR LOADINGS 

threeFL_df <- which(FL_count == 3) # subsetting for items that loaded on three factors

threeFL_df <- Final_DF[threeFL_df, ]

tbl3 <- as.data.frame(table(threeFL_df$LoadedFactor))

knitr::kable(tbl3)
```
```{r}
threeFL_notsplit_df <- with(threeFL_df, which(LoadedFactor %in% c("Com_Neg_F1_Time, MTurk_Neg_F4_Time, SMU_Neg_F1_Time", "Com_Neg_F2_NegApp, MTurk_Neg_F1_NegApp, SMU_Overall_F4_NegApp", "Com_Neg_F4_Flow_Prelim, MTurk_Overall_F7_Flow, SMU_Overall_F8_Flow", "Com_Overall_F4_Pain, MTurk_Neg_F3_Pain, SMU_Neg_F4_Pain", "Com_Overall_F4_Pain, MTurk_Neg_F3_Pain, SMU_Neg_F6_Pain", "Com_Overall_F4_Pain, MTurk_Neg_F5_Pain, SMU_Neg_F6_Pain", "Com_Overall_F5_Prog, MTurk_Overall_F5_Prog, SMU_Overall_F5_Prog", "Com_Overall_F6_PosApp, MTurk_Overall_F4_PosApp, SMU_Overall_F6_PosApp", "Com_Pos_F1_Cog, MTurk_Overall_F3_Cog, SMU_Pos_F1_Cog")))

threeFL_notsplit_df <- threeFL_df[threeFL_notsplit_df, ]

threeFL_notsplit_NoNum <- threeFL_notsplit_df[,-c(1, 49)] # removing non-numerical columns

threeFL_notsplit_df$firstloading <- apply(threeFL_notsplit_NoNum, 1, function(z) na.omit(z)[1]) # extract first loading 

threeFL_notsplit_df$firstloading <- as.numeric(threeFL_notsplit_df$firstloading)

threeFL_notsplit_df$secondloading <- apply(threeFL_notsplit_NoNum, 1, function(z) na.omit(z)[2]) # extract second loading 

threeFL_notsplit_df$secondloading <- as.numeric(threeFL_notsplit_df$secondloading)

threeFL_notsplit_df$thirdloading <- apply(threeFL_notsplit_NoNum, 1, function(z) na.omit(z)[3]) # extract third loading 

threeFL_notsplit_df$thirdloading <- as.numeric(threeFL_notsplit_df$thirdloading)

threeFL_notsplit_df$firstFL_inrange <- ifelse(abs(threeFL_notsplit_df$firstloading) >= .40 & abs(threeFL_notsplit_df$firstloading) < .75, TRUE, FALSE)

threeFL_notsplit_df$secondFL_inrange <- ifelse(abs(threeFL_notsplit_df$secondloading) >= .40 & abs(threeFL_notsplit_df$secondloading) < .75, TRUE, FALSE)

threeFL_notsplit_df$thirdFL_inrange <- ifelse(abs(threeFL_notsplit_df$thirdloading) >= .40 & abs(threeFL_notsplit_df$thirdloading) < .75, TRUE, FALSE)

threeFL_notsplit_df$category <- ifelse(threeFL_notsplit_df$firstFL_inrange == TRUE & threeFL_notsplit_df$secondFL_inrange == TRUE & threeFL_notsplit_df$thirdFL_inrange == TRUE, "GREEN", "NOT_GREEN")
```
